text:
Unfortunately,
Windows doesn't have a GUI method of doing that. There are third-party apps,
like Minitool Partition Wizard and AOMEI Partition Assistant. Home users are
going to have some serious problems with this update. -S
Link: None

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
metadata.email_text_original:
[You don't often get email from patchmanagement.org@12pd.com. Learn why this is
important at https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification ] Unfortunately,
Windows doesn't have a GUI method of doing that. There are third-party apps,
like Minitool Partition Wizard and AOMEI Partition Assistant. Home users are
going to have some serious problems with this update. -S
Link: None
